title: How to take up no cooperation from hospital about huge bill supposed to be billed to Insurance?
question: Hospital sent huge bill which was supposed to be billed to Insurance. Insurance says they never received the claim and happy to interact with hospital people. Hospital people never contact insurance even after requesting so many times. Now they don't even respond and moved our bill to collection! How can proceed here?
answers: Bankruptcy may be the fastest and most cost effective solution but is not going to always be the right way to handle this matter. Depending on your overall financial situation, Bankruptcy may be right for you. An experienced CA Bankruptcy attorney will be able to determine which type of Bankruptcy, if any is the correct one for you. Use AVVO's Find a Lawyer tool to select a qualified attorney. Good luck.
